articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A passenger’s hand became trapped in the closing doors of a train leaving Ealing Broadway station.
articles.title: Elizabeth line passenger hurt after getting hand stuck in moving train doors

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The legal team behind Mike Jeffries, arrested earlier this year on sex trafficking charges, has requested a hearing to determine his fitness to stand trial.
articles.title: Abercrombie & Fitch: Former CEO has dementia, lawyers say

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The supermarket says its systems are back to normal but some customers still don't have their Christmas shop.
articles.title: Morrisons customers still waiting for Christmas deliveries

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Thousands of Christians protest to urge Syria's new Islamist leadership to protect minorities.
articles.title: Protest erupt in Syria after Christmas tree set alight

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The government says it will "restore clarity" for vehicle manufacturers and the charging industry.
articles.title: Consultation launched over petrol and diesel car phase-out

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Four rioters are jailed after a Europa League match between Ajax and Israeli club Maccabi Tel Aviv.
articles.title: Four given jail terms for Amsterdam attacks on Maccabi Tel Aviv fans

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ursa Major ran into trouble in the Mediterranean between Spain and Algeria, with two crew still missing.
articles.title: Russian ship under US sanctions sinks after engine room blast

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC hears from several people left out of pocket by a Yorkshire-based competitions company.
articles.title: 'I won £18k in Level Up Giveaways draw but haven't seen a penny'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Flights were suspended for around an hour due to an issue that impacted the systems needed to release its planes.
articles.title: American Airlines resumes Christmas Eve flights after technical issue

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The hope is the probe could help us to better understand how the Sun works.
articles.title: Nasa's Parker Solar Probe attempts closest ever approach to Sun
